title: Win It! A St. Tropez Gift Bag
content: Giveaways June 02, 2018 Win It! A St. Tropez Gift Bag “Extra” is giving a St. Tropez gift bag to 5 lucky friends. Enter below for your chance to win! With summer weather approaching, self-tanner is a quick, easy and safe way to get a bronze body just in time for crop top season, and this St. Tropez gift bag has all the essentials to make it happen. Each winner will receive: Purity Mousse Purity Mist Extra Dark Mousse Applicator Mitt To learn more, visit StTropezTan.com Enter below for your chance to win! * Required Fields First Name* Last Name* Email* Phone* Street Address* Apartment / Unit City* State (US Residents)* Zip/Postal Code* Country I have read and I accept the Official Rules* I am at least 18 years of age* Sign up for the Extra Newsletter Yes! Telepictures and Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. may also share those details with WB/Time Warner Affiliates so they may send me tailored email and other offers. Telepictures and Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. is requesting this consent on behalf of its affiliates, which will use the information under their respective privacy policies. Telepictures and Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. may use my email address along with my interests and device data to send me tailored email and other offers through social media or other sites and apps. Opt out at any time by sending email to privacy@wb.com, by mail to “Privacy Group, Warner Bros., 4000 Warner Blvd, Burbank, CA 91522,” or by unsubscribing via a link in the email. By submitting my email address, I agree to the Terms of Service and I acknowledge that I have read and understand the Privacy Policy. Follow "Extra" on Twitter and like us on Facebook to find out about more chances to win exclusive giveaways! Giveaway ends on June 16, 2018 at 11:59 PM PST. | Official Rules #Giveaways Comments Around the Web More In Giveaways Giveaways Win It! A St. Tropez Gift Bag Giveaways Win It!
